definition[0]: the first person to do something, or the first thing to happen
example[0]: There are now many similar housing projects but this was the first.
example[1]: We hope this yearâ€™s festival will be the first of many.
example[2]: I always thought my sister would be the first to get married.
example[3]: James was the first to arrive.
definition[1]: used after the name of a king, queen, or pope when other later ones have the same name
example[4]: Queen Elizabeth the First  (=written as Queen Elizabeth I)
